body_html:
There's one deprecation warning I couldn't figure out, namely the following:
DEPRECATION WARNING: ActiveRecord::Base.raise_in_transactional_callbacks= is deprecated, has no effect and will be removed without replacement. (called from <top (required)> at /Users/pudidis/coding/rgsoc-teams/config/environment.rb:5)

This would appear to have been a stopgap between Rails 4.1 and 4.2 and will be removed soon. However, I couldn't find where we defined it.

Could this be it? https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/blob/feature/rails-5/config/application.rb#L33

(great work by the way!)

body:
> There's one deprecation warning I couldn't figure out, namely the following:
`DEPRECATION WARNING: ActiveRecord::Base.raise_in_transactional_callbacks= is deprecated, has no effect and will be removed without replacement. (called from <top (required)> at /Users/pudidis/coding/rgsoc-teams/config/environment.rb:5)`

> This would appear to have been a stopgap between Rails 4.1 and 4.2 and will be removed soon. However, I couldn't find where we defined it.

Could this be it? https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/blob/feature/rails-5/config/application.rb#L33

(great work by the way!)
